member.name: D2D1_RENDERING_CONTROLS
member.summary: Describes limitations to be applied to an imaging effect renderer.

member.name: D2D1_RENDERING_CONTROLS.bufferPrecision
member.summary: The buffer precision used by default if the buffer precision is not otherwise specified by the effect or by the transform.

member.name: D2D1_RENDERING_CONTROLS.tileSize
member.summary: The tile allocation size to be used by the imaging effect renderer.
